lemma eq_\<I>_converter_coinduct [consumes 1, case_names eq_\<I>_converter, coinduct pred: eq_\<I>_converter]: assumes "X conv conv'" and "\<And>conv conv' q. \<lbrakk> X conv conv'; q \<in> outs_\<I> \<I> \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> eq_\<I>_gpv (rel_prod (eq_onp (\<lambda>r. r \<in> responses_\<I> \<I> q)) (\<lambda>conv conv'. X conv conv' \<or> \<I>, \<I>' \<turnstile>\<^sub>C conv \<sim> conv')) \<I>' (run_converter conv q) (run_converter conv' q)" shows "\<I>, \<I>' \<turnstile>\<^sub>C conv \<sim> conv'"
